title: Microsoft previews Defender for IoT firmware analysis service
description: Microsoft announced the public preview of a new Defender for IoT feature that helps analyze the firmware of embedded Linux devices like routers for security vulnerabilities and common weaknesses. [...]

title: Lazarus hackers linked to $60 million Alphapo cryptocurrency heist
description: Blockchain analysts blame the North Korean Lazarus hacking group for a recent attack on payment processing platform Alphapo where the attackers stole almost $60 million in crypto. [...]

title: Almost 40% of Ubuntu users vulnerable to new privilege elevation flaws
description: Two Linux vulnerabilities introduced recently into the Ubuntu kernel create the potential for unprivileged local users to gain elevated privileges on a massive number of devices. [...]

title: SEC now requires companies to disclose cyberattacks in 4 days
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has adopted new rules requiring publicly traded companies to disclose cyberattacks within four business days after determining they're material incidents. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5028254 update fixes VPN performance issues, 27 bugs
description: Microsoft has released the July 2023 optional cumulative update for Windows 11, version 22H2, with fixes for 27 issues, including ones affecting VPN performance and display or audio devices. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5028244 update released with 19 fixes, improved security
description: Microsoft has released the optional KB5028244 Preview cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2 with 19 fixes or changes, including an update to the Vulnerable Driver Blocklist to block BYOVD attacks. [...]

title: NATO investigates alleged data theft by SiegedSec hackers
description: NATO has confirmed that its IT team is investigating claims about an alleged data-theft hack on the Communities of Interest (COI) Cooperation Portal by a hacking group known as SiegedSec. [...]

title: New Nitrogen malware pushed via Google Ads for ransomware attacks
description: A new 'Nitrogen' initial access malware campaign uses Google and Bing search ads to promote fake software sites that infect unsuspecting users with Cobalt Strike and ransomware payloads. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes bug that broke video recording in Windows apps
description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing video recording and playing failures in some apps on Windows 10 and Windows 11 systems. [...]

title: ALPHV ransomware adds data leak API in new extortion strategy
description: The ALPHV ransomware gang, also referred to as BlackCat, is trying to put more pressure on their victims to pay a ransom by providing an API for their leak site to increase visibility for their attacks. [...]
